segments.text: I'm watching the two children in the kitchen, and they're quite a pair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really putting himself out there for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got this shaky stool, but his determination is admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is deep in the jar, pulling out the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand, holding a plate, is a brilliant touch for a quick escape.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is the perfect accomplice, waiting patiently with an open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in perfect sync, a tiny team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother is completely oblivious, drying dishes right in front of an overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost comical how focused she is on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their daring little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so confident in their secret operation, it's quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, to be young and sneak cookies again!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with a few before they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
